description: Crisp cauliflower goes perfectly with buffalo hot sauce and creamy blue cheese dip, ideal for a veggie lunch.
name: Buffalo Cauliflower Wings with Blue Cheese Dip Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.4 cup hot sauce, frank's or similar

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with foil.
Whisk together the spices, onion and garlic powder and flour in a large bowl, then mix in the buttermilk to form a smooth batter.
Add the cauliflower to the batter and mix well to coat each floret. Spread the cauliflower on the baking tray in one layer and bake for 25 minutes, turning halfway through.
To make the blue cheese dip, mix the Greek yoghurt with the lemon juice, crumble in the blue cheese and stir well.
Toss the roasted cauliflower in the hot sauce and serve with blue cheese dip and optional celery sticks.
